channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will Minecraft Beat The Super Mario Bros. Movie's Record $1.3 Billion Box Office Next?
item.description: A Minecraft Movie has the highest domestic opening weekend for a video game movie but beating Mario's $1.36 worldwide box office record won't be easy.

item.title: Karate Kid: Legends Looks A Lot Like The Original Karate Kid, But It Should Change Daniel LaRussoâ€™s Story In 1 Big Way
item.description: Karate Kid Legends is duplicating the tried and true formula from Daniel's original story, but there is one way that this new movie must be different.

item.title: The Oscars' New Stunt Category Explained: Who It Recognizes & Why It Took So Long To Happen
item.description: The Academy Awards have finally added a category for stunts. Here's what we know about the award and why it's finally happened after 100 years.
